questions.question: A t-test is a significance test that assesses

answers.a: The mean of two independent groups
answers.b: The modes of two independent variables
answers.c: The standard devation of three independent variables
answers.d: The medians of two dependent groups

questions.question: A group of 10 students was randomly drawn from F.Y. B.Sc. class and was given yoga training for 3 weeks. Their wellness life style was compared with another similarly selected group which did not undergo such training. Which statistical test is an appropriate for testing tenability of null hypothesis?
Select the correct assumption for paired t-test.

answers.a: Every individual in the population may not have equal probability of being selected in sample.
answers.b: The data i.e. the difference for the matched pairs follows Normal distribution

questions.question: Choose the example of paired data

answers.a: The average of time spent on smartpones by 10 people
answers.b: Marks obtained by 20 students in the exam.
answers.c: Blood pressure measurement before & after administering a drug.
answers.d: The variability in the height of 10 plants.

questions.question: What will be the t value when 'between groups variance' and 'within groups variance' is 200 and 50 respectively.
